QuestData.Title: Report to Twinbraid
QuestData.Description: The Alliance owes a debt to the dwarves of Bael Modan, who built some of our earliest fortifications in the Barrens.$B$BTheir commander, General Twinbraid, is a real stalwart. One of our best. He's on patrol south of here, keeping the Horde on their toes.$B$BI definitely want to keep him appraised of the situation here so we can coordinate our next move. Can you deliver this frontline report to him in the field?
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Frontline Report to General Twinbraid, who is on patrol in Southern Barrens.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hrm, news from the fortress? Well. Spit it out!
QuestData.RewardText: <The General reads over the report, nodding in approval as he reads about the Battlescar.>$B$BQuite a name you're earning for yourself here in the Barrens, $n. But Roberts isn't going far enough. What we need is a decisive victory...
